attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as being born english and living in england therefore a precedent being set in my life. i do not want to be a part of europe along with all the others who may sign this petition, and i find it a gross violation of my human rights to be a part of an unelected european comittee to dictate to me a person born in england which i accept as part of the commonwealth and not a part of europe and when the channel tunnel was dug i never had a say in it along with eu regulations which i totally disagree with

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
